DOC.brief_summary: This measurement study design evaluate performance SureCALL® Labor Monitor® ( SureCALL® ) compare predicate Tocodynamometer device ( TOCO ) preterm term pregnant patient .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison SureCALL® Labor Monitor® Tocodynamometer Measurement Preterm Term Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: The SureCALL® Labor Monitor® ( SureCALL® ) transabdominal electromyography monitor intend measure uterine activity . It intend use pregnant woman , singleton pregnancy , use surface electrode maternal abdomen . The device intend use healthcare professional clinical setting . This measurement study design evaluate performance SureCALL® Labor Monitor® ( SureCALL® ) compare predicate Tocodynamometer device ( TOCO ) pregnant labor preterm patient , nonlaboring preterm patient , nonlaboring term patient . This study involve 25 woman Gestational Age 36 week less 5 woman Gestation Age great 36 five clinical site . Each study subject instrument two technology measure uterine activity : 1 . Standard tocodynamometer attach maternal abdomen , 2 . SureCALL® set abdominal surface electrode uterine electromyography attach maternal abdomen Subjects recieve intervention part study .
DOC.criteria: Singleton Pregnancy Informed Consent Required Multifetal Pregnancy Informed Consent Not Given
